sub_tasks.requirements: Gender Selection: Filters for female patients using p.gender = 'F'.
Age Range Selection: Filters for patients aged 75-85 using p.anchor_age BETWEEN 75 AND 85.
Ventilation Identification: Correctly identifies patients on invasive mechanical ventilation by filtering chartevents for itemid = 223849.
Temporal Filtering of Vitals: Correctly filters vital signs to the first 48 hours of the ICU stay using DATETIME_DIFF(ce.charttime, tc.intime, HOUR) BETWEEN 0 AND 48.
Vital Sign Identification: Correctly identifies itemids for Heart Rate (220045) and Mean Arterial Pressure (220181, 220052).
Instability Score Logic: Correctly defines hypotension (map < 65) and tachycardia (heart_rate > 100) and combines them into a point instability score.
Data Cleaning: Applies plausible physiological range filters and removes nulls for heart rate and MAP to ensure data quality before scoring.
Stay-Level Aggregation: Correctly aggregates point scores to a per-stay composite instability score using AVG().
90th Percentile Calculation: Correctly calculates the 90th percentile of the composite instability score using APPROX_QUANTILES.
Risk Stratification: Correctly identifies the top 25% of unstable patients using NTILE(4) ordered by the composite instability score descending.
Outcome Calculation: Correctly joins with the admissions table to retrieve mortality status and calculates averages for specified outcomes (ICU LOS, mortality, etc.) grouped by risk group.
Correct Table Joins: Accurately joins patients, icustays, chartevents, and admissions tables.
Key Matching: Consistently uses subject_id, hadm_id, and stay_id as joining keys between the respective datasets.
